name: Arkamania: Brick Breaker Game
description:
Arkamania is a brick-breaker game with an addictive gameplay of classics such as Arkanoid and Breakout. Move the ball, destroy all blocks and you will get the next level. Just tap on screen to control the paddle.

Includes extras and power-ups that increase the fun: invisible and unbreakable bricks, shot laser, larger paddle, 3 or 5 balls at once, extra lives and much more ...

There are 132 designed levels in 4 separated worlds. With interesting graphics and a scrolling background giving an attractive environment. Graphics are also looks different for high resolution tablets.

Release all levels of different 4 worlds and become a brick breaker master. There are 132 levels waiting for you!!!

This amazing game has been translated to the following languages: English, Spanish, Italian, French, German, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean and Russian.

Play, enjoy it and share your high scores on Facebook or Twitter.
